<table width="100%" cellpadding="10" cellspacing="0" border="0"><tr><td>

    












<form action="UpdateUserPreferences.jspa" method="post" name="jiraform" onsubmit="if (this.submitted) return false; this.submitted = true; return true" >

	
	<table class="jiraform maxWidth" id="edit_user_preferences"
    >
	

	
	<tr>
		<td colspan="2" class="jiraformheader">
        
        <h3 class="formtitle">Update User Preferences</h3></td>
	</tr>
	
	
	<tr>
		<td colspan="2" class="jiraformheader">
        Update your preferences below to control how JIRA works and looks to you.
        </td>
	</tr>
	
	

	
	

	<tr 
        
        
    >
		
		
			
			
				<td class="fieldLabelArea">
			
		
        
        
 		
		Number of Issues displayed per Issue Navigator page:
        
        
		</td>

	
	





	<td bgcolor="ffffff" class="fieldValueArea" >



<input type="text"
       name="userIssuesPerPage"
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         value="50"
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
/>




	</td>

</tr>



        



	



	<tr 
        
        
    >
		
		
			
			
				<td class="fieldLabelArea">
			
		
        
        
 		
		Outgoing email format:
        
        
		</td>

	
	





	<td bgcolor="ffffff" class="fieldValueArea" >










<select name="userNotificationsMimeType"
        id="userNotificationsMimeType_select"
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
>
   
      
   
   
      
   

   
   
   
       
   

   
   
	  <option value="html" 
              
              
              
              >
        
        HTML
      </option>
   
	  <option value="text" SELECTED
              
              
              
              >
        
        Text
      </option>
   
</select>


<span class="selectDescription" id="userNotificationsMimeType_summary"></span>





	</td>

</tr>



        



	



	<tr 
        
        
    >
		
		
			
			
				<td class="fieldLabelArea">
			
		
        
        
 		
		Language:
        
        
		</td>

	
	





	<td bgcolor="ffffff" class="fieldValueArea" >

        id="userLocale_select"
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
         
      
>
   
      
   
   
      
   

   
   
   
       
   

   
   
	  <option value="-1"

        English (United States) [Default]
      </option>

      </option>

      </option>

		</td>

	
	





	<td bgcolor="ffffff" class="fieldValueArea" >

       name="notifyOwnChanges"
       value="true"
     
        
     
     
        
     
     
        
     
     
        
     
     
        
     
     
        
     
     
        
     
/>





	</td>

	<tr

		Default sharing for filters and dashboards:
        
        
		</td>

	
	





	<td bgcolor="ffffff" class="fieldValueArea" >



    <input type="radio"
            
            
            
           name="shareDefault"
           value="false"
           id="shareDefault_false"
            
                
            
            
                
            
            
                
            
            
                
            
            />
    <label for="shareDefault_false">
        Public
    </label>
    
        <br />
    

    <input type="radio"
            
            checked="checked"
            
           name="shareDefault"
           value="true"
           id="shareDefault_true"
            
                
            
            
                
            
            
                
            
            
                
            
            />
    <label for="shareDefault_true">
        Private
    </label>
    
        
    






	</td>

</tr>
